entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, feeling sicker than Ron ever felt.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who had never felt as sick as Harry did.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry and Ron, who said she wouldn't say 'I told you so'.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who was present when Harry told the others what had happened.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: The ghost of a former student, who took it upon herself to tell the story in every bathroom in the castle.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student, who was visited by Pansy Parkinson and vilified Harry.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: A student who visited Malfoy in the hospital wing and vilified Harry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The Potions master, who told the story to others.

relationships.description: Harry felt sicker than Ron ever felt.
Hermione said she wouldn't say 'I told you so' to Harry.
Pansy Parkinson visited Malfoy in the hospital wing.
Moaning Myrtle told the story to Harry and others in every bathroom in the castle.
